subtitleNullable: Daily climate data in the city of Semarang from 2020 to 2023
descriptionNullable:
I took this data for research purposes. I've cleaned it up so it's a quality time-series dataset. I wanted to share it with the Kaggle community. Please upvote the dataset if you find this dataset helpful 😁.

# Dataset Information
**Measured city climate:** Semarang  
**Data taken from:** [https://dataonline.bmkg.go.id/home](https://dataonline.bmkg.go.id/home)  
**Stations that take data:** [Stasiun Klimatologi Jawa Tengah](https://iklimjateng.info/)  
**Range date in dataset:** 1 January 2020 to 31 December 2023  
**Column explanation:**  
- **Tanggal:** Daily time (day-month-year)  
  For this column, i don't set it as datetime type. Convert it to datetime first if you want to use it.
- **Tn:** Minimum Temperature (°C)
- **Tx:** Maximum Temperature (°C)
- **Tavg:** Average Temperature (°C)
- **RH_avg:** Average Humidity (%)
- **RR:** Rainfall (mm)
- **ss:** Duration of Sunshine (hours)
- **ff_x:** Maximum Wind Speed (m/s)
- **ddd_x:** Wind Direction at Maximum Speed (°)
- **ff_avg:** Average Wind Speed (m/s)
- **ddd_car:** Most Common Wind Direction (°)
